definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水体的农场灌溉是人们最大的淡水单一使用。

sentences.english: Combat that with a small fan on your desk that will help keep air circulating in your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 要解决它可以用一个小风扇助你周围空气流通。

sentences.english: This new bill will be circulated along with current NTD100 bills.
sentences.chinese: 这版新钞将与现行的百元钞券同时流通。

sentences.english: At last, the authors presented the standard to judge debris flow changing its course in grooves.
sentences.chinese: 创建了沟谷泥石流流通沟槽发生改道运动的判断标准。

sentences.english: There are at least two kinds of Francs :French and Swiss.
sentences.chinese: 法国的法朗和德国的马克在国际间也流通，是吗？

sentences.english: It also tends to weaken the currency and increase inflation.
sentences.chinese: 它削弱了货币流通并提高了通胀。

sentences.english: The price of the public shares' currency must be fair and marketable.
sentences.chinese: 公股流通的价格要公平和市场化。

sentences.english: Even though, the country has only one piece of land and 2 Dollar in circulation.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，这个岛国还只有一个岛和2元货币流通。

sentences.english: Non-transferable shares are the unique issue in Chinese stock market.
sentences.chinese: 非流通股是中国证券市场的独特问题。

sentences.english: Silver and gold coins were once in common use in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 金银币曾经是美国的流通货币。
在CCL的收藏中，那是耶鲁大学的高流通库。

sentences.english: Commonly known as Safflower, this herb is used to move blood.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知比如藏红花，就是用于促进血液流通。

sentences.english: You can find and create new distribution channels for your products.
sentences.chinese: 你可以找到你的流通渠道，创造新的产品。

sentences.english: Regularly check the thumbnail for circulation.
sentences.chinese: 定时检查手指尖了解血液流通情况。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans help to circulate the air, keeping the air temperature 3-8 degrees cooler.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇能流通空气，使空气温度降低三到八度。

sentences.english: But, the exhibition also has its particularity, apart from other circulation medium.
sentences.chinese: 但是，展览也有其特殊性，有别于其他流通媒介。

definition: fractional currency (coin or note of value smaller than the country's unit of currency)/token (used instead of money for slot machines etc)
local currency/our own currency/abbr. to 本幣|本币
flat silver (former coinage)/also written 銀圓|银圆/silver dollar
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
flat silver (former coinage)/also written 銀元|银元/silver dollar
